title: brain breaks
content:
What will this code produce?

class Confusion
  def self.confuse
    never_defined = 'defined' if false
    never_defined
  end

  def method_missing(m, *args)
    'Will you see this?'
  end
end

puts Confusion.confuse

Update: KirinDave has a more informative explanation on the caboose blog.
